model  {

for( i in 1:100)     #  Loop over 100 subjects
{

for (j in 1:10)       #  Loop over 10 data points per subjet
    {
        bp[j,i] ~ dnorm(mu[i] , tau.w)   #  Data are normally distributed
    }
        mu[i] ~ dnorm(mean.bp, tau.b)  #  Means are normally distributed
}

mean.bp ~ dnorm(70, .001)          # Prior for mean BP

tau.w <-  1/(sigma.w*sigma.w)     #  Prior for within SD (precision)
sigma.w ~ dunif(0,100)

tau.b <-  1/(sigma.b*sigma.b)    #  Prior for between SD (precision)
sigma.b ~ dunif(0,100)

        }

#  Initial Values

list(sigma.w = 7, sigma.b = 12, mean.bp = 70)

#  Data
